title: "How to become a creator of your own reality through automagnetization?"
first_phrase: The last 200 tokens of this text continue the discussion about the practical program for being creators of one's reality. The author explains the four phases of creating a new reality: inspiration, projection, scrutiny, and purification. The author emphasizes that the process of focusing on what one wants must be in line with one's personal development and evolution. The author also discusses the benefits of contemplation and how it can guide and show the way towards one's desired outcome. The text is grounded in the author's teachings on automagnetization and the connection between mind and matter.

Infatti più si arriva a dare realtà all’immagine interna, più ci avviciniamo al centro del nostro essere. Il pericolo è allora di non distinguere più realtà interna ed esterna. Ognuno vive in un mondo di esperienze che chiama realtà. last_phrase: In conclusion, the practice of contemplation and visualization has the power to help us reach the center of our being, but there are risks involved in this practice and it is important to remain aware and not be swallowed by the new reality we create. Hypnosis, on the other hand, can help us transcend certain limitations of the ego and access our inner potential, but it also requires a state of presence and attention. Ultimately, the key to success in all these practices is to stay focused and patient, and to approach them with a clear intention and a deep understanding of their potential and limitations.
